Question: HK Applied Science & Technology Research Inst. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
HK Applied Science & Technology Research Inst.

Product 1

- GUIDi - AI Smart Belt: Empowers visually impaired individuals with real-time navigation using MEMS and AI technology. Features dual wide-angle cameras, edge AI module, sensor integration, haptic navigation, and voice command. Mobile app offers voice command support and over-the-air updates.

- 0.13'' Micro LED Display Module: Offers ultra-high pixel density (10000ppi) for AR/XR products. Features high brightness, long lifetime, and high efficiency of micro-LEDs.

20 startups from Hong Kong Tech Pavilion at CES 2024 demonstrate R&D strengths in AI & Data, Advanced Manufacturing, Life & Health, and Sustainability. HKSTP is fostering global startup expansion and will attend the "Talk to China" dialogue series. The pavilion is located at Hall G â€“ 63400, Eureka Park, Venetian Expo, Las Vegas. The CES Innovation Awards at CES 2024 were received by two HKSTP Park companies: AI Guided Limited and Sitan Semiconductor International Co. Limited.
